fig.label: Figure 5.
fig.alt-text: Five maps indicating recent climate (1981–2010), short-term projected climate (2011–2040) for RCP4.5 and RCP8.5, and long-term projected climate (2041–2070) for RCP4.5 and RCP8.5. The risk categories for climatic suitability for Chikungunya transmission are unsuitable, rather unsuitable, partly suitable, rather suitable, and suitable.
